select wisod.stock_order_det_id, ecqo.option1, ecqo.option2, bs.option1 as DHGUID, wiisss.contract_code as contract_code, wiisss.purchase_req_order_code as purchase_req_order_code, bm.material_code, ecqo.location_num, wiisss.option2 as dominant_term_code, wiisss.option1 as device_code, wisod.variance_qty AS variance_qty, iis.inventory_status_name AS inventory_status_name, wisod.storage_id AS storage_id, wisod.create_time, u.user_name as create_user_name, wiisss.inventory_id as inventory_id FROM wms_inner_stock_order_det wisod left join ocean_v2.sys_user u on wisod.create_user_id=u.user_id left join wms_inner_stock_order wiso on wisod.stock_order_id= wiso.stock_order_id left join wms_inner_inventory wii on wisod.batch_code= wii.batch_code left join wms_inner_inventory wiis on wisod.material_id= wiis.material_id left join wms_inner_inventory wiiss on wiso.warehouse_id= wiiss.warehouse_id left join wms_inner_inventory wiisss on wisod.storage_id= wiisss.storage_id left join base_inventory_status iis on wiisss.inventory_status_id= iis.inventory_status_id left join base_material bm on wisod.material_id= bm.material_id left join base_storage bs on wisod.storage_id= bs.storage_id left join eng_contract_qty_order ecqo on wiisss.contract_code=ecqo.contract_code and bm.material_code = ecqo.material_code
and wisod.stock_order_id = #{stockOrderId}
and wiisss.job_status =1
GROUP BY wisod.stock_order_det_id
